title: Report: Huaweiâ€™s Kirin Chip May Have Been Accelerated by Bitcoin Mining Orders
description: A recent report by The Miner Mag suggests bitcoin mining orders might have sped up Huawei’s development of its new Kirin smartphone chip. The chip, which powers Huawei’s new Mate 60 Pro smartphone, was produced by China’s Semiconductor Manufacturing International Corp. (SMIC) using its N+2 7nm process. Research Suggests Bitcoin Mining Boosted Huawei’s Chip Development, […]

title: MetaMask introduces Ethereum to fiat trades
description: MetaMask Portfolio has introduced a new “sell” feature, allowing users to convert their Ethereum holdings into select fiat currencies. MetaMask, known for its digital wallet services, has rolled out a “sell” feature that enables users to convert their Ethereum (ETH)…
